title: It Appears Chrissy Teigen Slept Through Casey Affleckâ€™s Oscar Speech
text:
It Appears Chrissy Teigen Slept Through Casey Affleckâ€™s Oscar Speech Was this a subtle protest? By Julia Brucculieri 
If you were sitting at home during Sunday nightâ€™s Oscar ceremony , trying your best not to fall asleep ( before the eveningâ€™s surprise ending ), you werenâ€™t alone. Chrissy Teigen was right there with you. 
During the show, it appeared the supermodel and cookbook author caught some zâ€™s at various points throughout the night. She was spotted with her eyes closed, resting her head on husband John Legendâ€™s shoulder. 
Here she is while Casey Affleck was giving his speech for Actor in a Leading Role (top right corner). Was this a subtle form of protest against the actor, whoâ€™s faced backlash this awards season after past sexual assault allegations filed against him resurfaced last September? 
Maybe she was just tired. Here she is again, this time spotted behind Meryl Streep (left side):
